website_summaries.verdict: Detailed swing tracking system that includes 14 individual sensors for each club in your bag with automatic data collection.
pros: Sensors attached to the grip of the golf clubs to provide data on strengths and weaknesses of each club you use
Sensors are lightweight and small, so they shouldn't hinder your golf swing
Full automatic tracking to your smartphone app, so you won't have to interrupt your golf game to store data
cons: Some local courses may not be part of the tracking database

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this works pretty awesome. The only annoying thing is that for the most part the putting distances are not accurate. It's annoying to have to move the flag manually for every hole. Otherwise, the distances and stats are pretty great. Easy to set up and fun to use. Also with an Iphone 8 I find that it only uses about 10% battery for an entire round. This is a relief compared to some reiews complaining about battery usage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been extremely pleased with my experience with Arccos. The synchronization process was very simple and straight forward and through a few rounds of use, Arccos has been almost effortless to use. The information provided is extremely valuable and if there ever was a need for an adjustment or two, the system allowed for easy editing to get things all squared up. I am looking forward to having Arccos all season long to be able to truly dive into my "real" golf stats and see what areas of my game need improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Saratoga Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cool product! My husband is obsessed with it! Cool features and feedback to better a golfer's game.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and he loves this. This was a big purchase for me because I didn't know if it would really work or not, but he absolutely loves it. In fact, he loves it so much he ended up buying an apple watch so he could use that while golfing and getting notifications on his watch rather than pulling out his phone after each shot. It provides so much feedback and he's in love with it. Great for the obsessed golfer!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy White

customer_reviews.title: Install and pairing was quick and easy. All shots on the course registered with only ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 round in the books but it worked perfectly. Install and pairing was quick and easy. All shots on the course registered with only a couple tap ins needing to be manually added. iPhone 6S was at 78% battery at end of round and I looked at almost every shot and used the gps so very good battery usage. Can't wait for next round.
customer_reviews.author: Kenney J.  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: The Arccos 360 system has nice packaging and setup was easy. However, there was an issue with my home course where the Arccos database listed a different course with the same name in my course history. I contacted Arccos and they were quick to respond, but after multiple changes the course still isn’t correct. Additionally, a course I had previously downloaded wouldn’t pull up when I got to the course, and because of the cell reception there I couldn’t pull it up. When I finally unlocked the caddie feature, it didn’t work on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Bern

customer_reviews.title: Tried at two courses and the product captured less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried at two courses and the product captured less than 5% of my shots andgave me results such as 510 yard drive Albatross. Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: John Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great tracking devise
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with the sensors , 3 of the regular sensors and the putter sensor didn't work right out of the box. Contacted Arcoss and they sent me new sensors free of charge. The replacement putter sensor only worked for 1 round , contacted Arcoss again and they mailed me another putter sensor with an extra battery Excellent customer service but for the $300 price I shouldn't have any problems with a new product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DiBari

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Minus Slight Frustrations!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product....when it works as advertised....which is about 75-80% of the time. It’s incredibly frustrating when it doesn’t work and it causes you to spend too much time on the course fidgeting with your phone to track shots. Everything else about it is amazing and it would absolutely be 5 Stars without the aforementioned. It’s keep an incredible amount of stats and has a caddie feature after you play 5 rounds that will give suggestions based on your previous recorded data. Great product all in all - worth it for the small amount of frustration and if they get that part fixed, it will be a complete no-brainer for anyone looking to improve their game!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The product is not ready for prime time. It misreads shots very frequently, and reading putts is pretty much a miss most of the time. Also it drains my Iphone X's battery on around 14-15 holes. I used it around 3 rounds and stopped using it because it's nothing but headache to try and correct misreads during a round and not being able to complete a round.
customer_reviews.author: ubp

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: The system was extremely easy to set up, took just a couple minutes to get everything synced with my phone. When beginning a round just enter the course name into the app (it usually knows where you are) and hit "Start Round." Arccos takes over from there. The amount of data it automatically tracks is both impressive and insightful. On the rare occasion when it has missed a shot or recorded something inaccurately the editing process is simple and quick. Its helped me whittle down my handicap and I'd highly recommended to all the other golf junkies out there.
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I keep my iPhone in my front pocket and it works well. I like the app and it has helped me focus on my problem areas at practice. I like how it tracks my shots and I think the online review of my rounds work great. I don't typically use the caddie function since I have a GPS watch but when I have used the caddie function it has helped me.
customer_reviews.author: eel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Highly Recommend for Analyzing Golf Game
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is amazing. The overview of the course and the shot by shot analysis is great. I’m having a problem with the putter registering but customer service contacted me just because their software detected an issue. I haven’t worked on it yet but that is my problem. I just had an issue where 2 holes played were registered as 1 so it didn’t pick up everything correctly but assuming this can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: JennyNYC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!!!!! I've used this for 11 rounds so far and I love that it keeps all my scores and courses that I've played as well as the averages of the clubs for each stroke. But it Sucks for giving yourself a stroke or two, it counts them all lol
customer_reviews.author: BLAW

customer_reviews.title: Received in a timely manner, but two of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner, but two of the sensors did not work. This causes me concern on how long the sensors that were working are going to last and if I will have to pay for those when they go out. I contacted Arccos support and they only asked for a an address to send two new sensors and were very customer friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Steffenauer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It will miss a tap in out here or there but other than that it is fantastic. Better than expected. The ONLY problem is it is clear I am a terrible golfer! I play 18 holes and it only drains about 30-35% battery on my iPhone 7 and that is without placing in airplane mode. Hopefully they get the release out where it will function with the Apple Watch so you don’t have to have the phone in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Arcos 360 golf
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with Arcos 360. Pairing clubs was easy. Mine came with 3 nonfunctional sensors which they replaced in 3 days. The gps maps of courses is great. This finally gives me real time data on how far and where I am hitting each club. The only things I would improve are when on the green, have it record how far each putt goes not just how far from first putt to hole and on par 3 holes I can’t see the club and distance for the tee shot on the gps map. Overall I am very happy with this product and would recommend it to any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Misses 10-15 strokes per round.
customer_reviews.text: Like several others, I gave up on the Arccos 360 system after two rounds. It drains my battery after 10 holes and misses multiple shots on every hole. Even after manually correcting the scoring between holes, I was missing 10 stokes compared to the paper scorecard I kept during the round. I'm returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Fishcat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the stats and information. This really helps me understand where I need to work on my game and how far I really hit my clubs. The only issue I have run into is getting the correct number of putts on the green. Tap ins sometimes do not register or if I tap the green, it records that as a putt......I just have to change my routine for the system to accurately detect my shots.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Not there yet
customer_reviews.text: The potential for these are great, but sad to say the true functionality is just not there yet. The app is clunky and either sensors or connection to app is not always reliable. I want them to just keep track of my distances and directions and log them over time so I can see patterns, but not quite worth it yet. You end up screwing around with them too much and then finally I just don’t use them. Would also be nice if there was an easy way to say whether or not you hit a full shot
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: With iOS it works great
customer_reviews.text: The product works extremely well and Arccos is a great company to deal with if you have any issues. After my first summer with the sensors I got new irons and they helped easily explain to me how to program my new irons in and not mix data. Then I lost a sensor for one of my wedges and even though they sell new individual sensors for exactly this, when I told them what happened they said they would happily send me one for free.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: great system
customer_reviews.text: Love this system, works great, only complaint with it at all is putter sensor is so sensitive sometimes picks up putt didnt do. must carry upside down as I do, but sometimes walking bump it and will engage and add putt, but that is only complaint, otherwise great system, well worth the money and works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest shot tracker I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: The system is pretty easy to use. It picks up most strokes and correctly records club and distance. However, the estimated distances for my home course are not very accurate. I like the data on how far I hit individual clubs, but I can’t trust the estimates of hoe far I am from the green.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle76

customer_reviews.title: So you want to improve your game, and don’t know where to begin?
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, once installed, Arccos Golf creates a relational database of factors derrived from the end user’s golf skills. It compiles data, and assigns values to your game play: individual club distances, fairway success, scores, rounds played, and so much more. In the end you have a manageble database that let’s you identify personal strengths and weaknesses, allowing you to target specific areas requiring improvement. Since you can always do better - Arccos helps you see the path to improving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf improvement tool
customer_reviews.text: These are the next step in figuring out your golf game. Tracking your strokes is great but seeing the distances and being able to learn your own game is the best part. After each round you can see strokes gained or lost by each facet. Good for any handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Arccos 360 Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the app. Intuitive and easy to use. The Arccos support team is AMAZING. I have about 20 rounds in so far. My GHIN HI was a 6.1 before Arccos and I posted a 5.3 at the most recent revision. May not appear to be a big move to most; but it is. With the introduction of Arccos Caddie this technology is only getting better and better. If you love looking at your data and more importantly want to have accurate distances for your clubs these Arccos sensors are worth every penny. Keep up the great work team Arccos!
customer_reviews.author: scottyj1015

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is really good and helps me look back at my game and gives all kinds of statistics. The putting is something you need to watch out and add missing putts if it does not automatically detect it. But you will get a hang of it pretty soon and is really easy to add the putt. One of the sensors was not working but I email Arccos and they immediately sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amarnath

customer_reviews.title: Fun to look at the data.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that would make this better is if I could look at the course BEFORE starting my round so that I could spend a few minutes the night before planning my shots. It doesn’t lose a star for that because that’s not what it claims to do. Super simple. Just watch your putts.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Q. Witte

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Play golf 3 to 4 times a week. Love that it works with my Apple Watch so I don’t need to Carry my phone. Also like the play like distance.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Scran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. More data than I know what to do with. My putter sensor wasnt working for every putt for a round so I added the puts manually. Arccos emailed me the next day about it without me even contacting them, they must keep track of that stuff, I told them what was going on and they are sending me a brand new updated version at no expense. That's what I call top notch customer service, they want this product to catch on.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A Langlois

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Very limited operation and the advertising is very misleading. Check the faqs carefully
customer_reviews.author: Doug Masse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool for anyone looking to improve their golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Centanni

customer_reviews.title: liked it
customer_reviews.text: i loved it until i got a 9 wood, it will not recognize it on the golf course, but up to that it was great. When you look at each hole, it shows up, just not in total paired clubs list.
customer_reviews.author: S A M

customer_reviews.title: Great stats and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've played a few rounds and so far it has been great. Adding penalty strokes is pretty straight forward and the stats are great. Two sensors didn't work when they came in, but Arccos detected that I was having problem pairing them and prompted me to email support. Two new sensors were mailed the next day! I have been amazed at the accuracy of the sensors at picking up shots and not picking up superfluous movements. So far I have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for its features. While it worked, it was fine. Problems: was too inconsistent in detecting shots and tee boxes. So requires intervention almost every hole to ensure accuracy. Impossible to play well if one was to focus on the app. And after 11 months, almost 60% of the sensors are no longer working. Save your money and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Purpledog

customer_reviews.title: A very helpful tool
customer_reviews.text: A very helpful tool in analyzing your game. It allows you to get a true sense of actually how far you hit a particular club, providing you valuable information when you need to hit a specific type of shot. I have really enjoyed using the Arccos 360.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product, great service.
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended, and the customer service at Arccos is very solid. One of the sensors ripped the top of one of my older club’s old grip, so I called and asked what they can do, and they sent me out a brand new Arccos Smart Grip to replace the grip that was damaged. Seems like a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Understand your game better.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a phone gps system so don’t expect perfection but it is extremely easy to edit every hole you play and the tracking and history of every shot is the best golf tool I have ever had. I’ve only used it for 3 rounds but I can already see what this system is going to do for my game. I am already starting to make some better club decisions based on the few rounds I have played.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Try Blast Golf instead, much better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Can only be used while playing rounds of golf on listed courses. No good for any practice. Also kept asking me to pay $99 for the App that was supposed to be included for free in $249 product. Try Blast Golf instead, much better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: imollyq

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, she contacted customer service and they were quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my mom. She loves it! When she first received it, 3 of the sensors were broken/dead battery. Fortunately, she contacted customer service and they were quick to send her replacements!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2.0 is much better
customer_reviews.text: Really good . I played 9 holes and it was amazing. Love the stats. Much better than the last version. I am worried about it twisting and destroying the grip hole.
customer_reviews.author: Do What You Promise

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product 3 times and it works great. No issues with connections so far and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product 3 times and it works great. No issues with connections so far and I love the stats. I can't wait to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: vaca-hooch

customer_reviews.title: Easy tonuse
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Turn it on and do nothing else. Only negatives are screw on club Sensors are coming loose and I have already lost one so that club doesn’t work. Also must keep phone in front pocket but I have become use to that
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: Great game improver!
customer_reviews.text: Love Arccos! Upgraded my set last year and this is my favorite. Lowered my score and helped show me where I need work on my game.
customer_reviews.author: Burris128

customer_reviews.title: Little more difficult to use than I thought. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Little more difficult to use than I thought. Have got the hang of it and think it will help my game.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bass

customer_reviews.title: This is a really awesome tool. I can't wait until I get my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome tool. I can't wait until I get my fifth round played to unlock the rest of the features but I can see where this will have a huge impact on my game!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett L Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cool product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Can't wait to play more golf and see all the feedback.
customer_reviews.author: MDolli

customer_reviews.title: Best golf improvement  tool I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Father’s Day. I’ve used the system 3 rounds so far, and I’ve already improved some of my stats. I’ve shown it to all my friends and they will be getting the system as well. Seeing the data from each round let’s me know what I need to work on. Only downfall is having to keep phone in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parr

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Too much work editing shots. Doesn't always track clubs properly.
customer_reviews.author: korgo

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product...easy to install and understand...easy to use...id give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Miteysquirrel

customer_reviews.title: i like this product however if using it on the fly ...
customer_reviews.text: i just used this for the first time for 36 holes up in stratton vermont. i like this product however if using it on the fly (which is what i did) i believe you will have difficulty editing your shot history and thus your score.
customer_reviews.author: Harold J. Kiamzon

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product that keeps getting better
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product that keeps getting better! Helps keep track of score, shot distances and avg club range, best , GIR etc
customer_reviews.author: Crashgtr

customer_reviews.title: I still can not figure out exactly how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I still can not figure out exactly how to use this. It is not real accurate. Have to watch it and will need to add or delete swings/
customer_reviews.author: E. ORFF

customer_reviews.title: It is like having your own caddy
customer_reviews.text: I was able to see where my golf game was lacking after the second round. I play the same course around 20 times a year. I'm able to see the (in)consistency of my ball strike. On the range, you always think you are going to hit a perfect 7 iron 150 yards right to the green and have the ball roll in for an eagle. With Arcos, I was able to have more accurate readings from the course. There are two downsides: (1) you need to have the phone in your pocket. And if you are like me, your phone is getting bigger and bigger and (2) it really drains the battery.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item NEW but when it arrived it was in USED condition!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a ton of money on this product as a gift expecting a brand new set of sensors etc. The box looked decent but upon opening a few sensors didn't have stickers, were scratched up, and had dirt on them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny. a must for any level of player.
customer_reviews.author: SRVEVH

customer_reviews.title: Best game analytics tool on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played over 100 rounds with arccos and can’t imagine ever playing without it again. It’s an amazing product that provides invaluable insight, not to mention they have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Using the Arccos setup has vastly improved my game and made golfing more fun! Tracking stats, suggesting clubs, and more I won’t go back now! It’s awesome with my Apple Watch too! Super easy to setup and use!
customer_reviews.author: Lance C. Risser

customer_reviews.title: Great for all Golfers
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gift for any golfer. Being able to return and see shot information helps better your game 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This app is amazing and really helps with shot selection and scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate data
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the sensor keeps falling off my putter into the bottom of the bag, I've worked for hours to keep the thing to stay, super glue is next.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Julian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate data acquiring device allowing the regular golfer to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely accurate data acquiring device allowing the regular golfer to step into the scratch golfing world! Make sure to bring a charger if you are to play more than 1 round!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sebastien Laprise

customer_reviews.title: I love my Arccos
customer_reviews.text: I love my Arccos. It works very well. Only problem I may see is the sensors pick up a shot when I pull out my club sometimes even if I didn't swing. Overall, love the system!
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY N MEDINA

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised. Very accurate readings on all clubs and easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to try it out!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I live in the midwest so it is not really golf season. But I bought the Arccos 360 in preparation for the season. It was very easy to set up. Looking forward to seeing how well it works. I did send the arccos driver to two people as christmas gifts (they live in the south), they seemed to like the arccos drivers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alex

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to set up. Only took 10 minutes. Left off 1 star because of inconsistencies in web to app settings and needs improvement for club labeling. Reporting is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mroz

customer_reviews.title: Great system just started using it last fall
customer_reviews.text: Great system just started using it last fall. Building data now. Know what to work on this spring. I expect to drop strokes this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product that tracks your progress and shows you where to improve
customer_reviews.author: T. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to anyone’s golf game. The new caddie AI is amazing! Absolutely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: System sometimes records too many shots, or stops working partway through round.
customer_reviews.author: Ken E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Through 10 rounds distances have been pretty accurate and have been exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Pelster

customer_reviews.title: Great feedback
customer_reviews.text: It does miss shots. Maybe 5 per round. It’s a small inconvenience checking your phone after every shot, especially playing $100 a hole. I’ve shut it off a couple times. If you are playing a non money game, it will be no problem.
customer_reviews.author: damien christian

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas gift to my son and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I m more than happy with this product, and I m really enjoying analyzing my game afterward. In original package I received 3 sensors which I could not pair, but once I reported I received 3 new sensors in less than a week. Great support and great product. I would definitely recommend this product to everyone who likes to play golf and likes to know how he performed!
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Great training product
customer_reviews.text: Product is accurate and is doing what it said it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Peoduct!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Gives you a real feel for your actual distances for each club as well as where your misses are. Great for looking at data to get the knowledge of what you really need to do to improve your game. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... only use Arccoss a few times I have really enjoyed this product
customer_reviews.text: I have only use Arccoss a few times I have really enjoyed this product. This has really improved my game so far well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely satisfied with this product and highly recommend this to any ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and detects my shots every time, even when putting. I tested the putt detection by quickly approaching the ball and putting without addressing and the Arccos still captured the stroke. I am extremely satisfied with this product and highly recommend this to any golfer who would like to gather data and improve their game.
customer_reviews.author: TylerV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Best thing I've ever done for my game.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Lotta fun to use and can't wait for a full season ...
customer_reviews.text: Lotta fun to use and can't wait for a full season and see stats. Easy correction for my mistake picking up a swing.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: ... for the golfer in the family and he's very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the golfer in the family and he's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Blackshear

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, doesn't work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but if you use a super stroke putter grip, it's not going to work great. Also, if you use tour wrap grips, it's not going to work either! I've spent so much money buying new grips that it is almost not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband the arcos system for his 50th birthday. He loves it. Can't stop talking abt all the data. Comes home and shows me all his best shots from every round. Says he is playing better than ever. Has convinced 2 of his friends to get it so they can compare stats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my husband likes and uses this product every round. ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband likes and uses this product every round. it does not change the feel of his club or grip to have the product attached.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene

customer_reviews.title: Great instructional tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the advice of my instructor - the plan is for us to review my rounds together. She can't be out with me on the course, so having a history of every shot and every decision that I have made on course will be really cool. I paired the sensors without any issues - that process was super easy and really pretty cool. It took me all of 5 minutes to get set up. I wasn't planning on playing today, but I headed out to the course 'cause I was too excited to test drive my new toy. I played 9 holes and the system worked flawlessly! I can't wait to dig into the stats.
customer_reviews.author: The Howlips Family

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to work great..
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for a few rounds, but it seems to work great....on an iPhone. I have a Galaxy S6 personally and an iPhone for a work phone, and on the iPhone I have had no issues. On the Android device it's very hit and miss, seems to be mainly GPS issues as I would wind up with 3 holes worth of strokes on 1 hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor product, not worth the money or time. Called the support number during open hours, got a voicemail. Send an email, never got a response. Pretty much requires constant tinkering to get accurate results which is not what I'd like to do while golfing.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kunning

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to set up on my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive sensors and accurate. So far it has allow me to pin point the areas I drastically need to improve. It was very easy to set up on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Saucillo

customer_reviews.title: Returned it, it doesn't work most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't track as it says it would. It misses 40% of the shots and the GPS isn't very accurate. I am returning it today after three rounds. The third round was incomplete at best. Great idea bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Working through difficulty!
customer_reviews.text: Still working on this system. I must tell you the customer service is outstanding! Not sure what the problem is but we are working on it as we speak! I keep having glitches with random shots. Could be me with banging clubs together or it could be the defibrillator Installed in my chest that is causing interference. We are sorting all that out now. Again, the support has been tremendous and I am sure we will find the solution to the problems.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 rounds with arccos and so far worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lift your Golf Game
customer_reviews.text: If you want to take your Golf Game to the next level This Is It...
customer_reviews.author: Danny Haas

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I ever bought my husband
customer_reviews.text: Best gift I ever bought my husband !! He loves it and the company is great! 3 sensors were not working and they overnighted 3 new ones!
customer_reviews.author: Marti N.

customer_reviews.title: Dead sensors on day 1
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 14 sensors were completely dead when they arrived. It's appalling that they don't ship extra sensors. I am switching back to game golf now. Game golf gave me a whole set of extra sensors and their product works well. I wanted this product to work well but with the driver putter and two irons not working, it's useless. Even if they are replaced, I am worried that won't last more than a few rounds. Update: I received a new set of tags and the putter tag STILL DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: shjr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly! Can't even tell they are on my clubs! I am so impressed at the stats they can pop out after each round. The only negative is that I have to keep my phone in my pocket while hitting. Maybe the next gen will be able to sync to my phone in the cart 50 ft away
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: He said the setup was super easy and has used it successfully since(about 5 rounds)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He said the setup was super easy and has used it successfully since(about 5 rounds). What he told me was challenging was the sensitivity of the putter. He often has to go in at the end of the round to edit the number of putts taken but apparently this is very easy to do. In my mind, this was a successful gift for my otherwise picky golf loving husband.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Did not consistently record which club was being used and ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not consistently record which club was being used and therefore recording distances for the wrong club. The sensor for the putter would fit inside the tops of Ping putter grips. The opening on the top of the grips is too shallow for the sensor to be attached to it. Had the same issue with a different brand of putter grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Putter sensor switched.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I received this product with the putter sensor replaced by a Gen 1 sensor. Anyone else have this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you didn't have to put the phone in your front pocket, this product would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was searching for!! Very good product!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Guindo

customer_reviews.title: I need to carry my huge cell phone in my shorts .. I think not.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. You have to carry your phone in the front pocket of your shorts/pants in order for it to work!!! I have an iPhone 7 Plus ... I think not. Kind of silly if you think about it. Good idea, but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: TMasterson

product_meta.title: Arccos Golf 360 Golf Performance Tracking System
product_meta.description: Arccos 360 is golf's first and only automatic on-course shot-tracking system, allowing golfers of all skill levels to harness the power of their data and AI to play smarter and shoot lower scores. Winner of the 2017 Golf Digest Editor's Choice Award for "Best Game Analyzer," it features 14 ultralight sensors - one for every club in your bag that pair with a smartphone app. And the data doesn't lie: Arccos users improved their handicap by an average of 3.55 strokes in 2017 . USER BENEFITS: Get AI-powered Caddie Advice for every shot, on every hole . Know your exact distance to any point on the course- Learn precisely which club to use in every situation- Identify your actual strengths and weaknesses . SYSTEM FEATURES- Ultralight, low-profile sensors- Battery designed to last 5 year- Power saving mode- Enhanced shot-detection algorithm . Arccos 360 is compatible with iPhone 5S and above, and select Android devices running marshmallow and above that include a Gyroscope and accelerometer. Product usage : Our product requires that the user play golf with their phone in their front pocket and golfers often leave their phone in their cart or bag, or in their back pocket which leads to missed shots. Our system also intentionally deletes a shot if two shots are detected in the same location (to avoid false-positives) but if a user is a poor golfer and hits 2 shots from the same location because they fail to advance the ball beyond 5 yards, they may report a "missed shot", but the product is functioning as expected in those situations
feature_bullets: Arccos users know the exact distance to any point on the course, learn precisely which club to use in every situation and identify actual strengths and weaknesses of their game.

Developed in partnership with Microsoft, Arccos Caddie shows your optimal strategy on any hole in the world. It analyzes every shot you’ve taken with Arccos, as well as 100 million+ shots taken by the Arccos community on more than 40, 000 courses.
Arccos 360 is hands-free and fully automatic. Unlike competing products, it requires no tagging, tapping or other annoying disruptions to a player's routine.

The updated low-profile sensors are 50% smaller and lighter than the original Arccos Golf system. Arccos 360 sensors feature a permanent battery that is designed to last five years. The sensors come standard with a no-questions-asked, two-year .
A free mobile app available for iOS or Android phones
Now includes free access to Arccos Caddie for iOS and Android
